name: Horrible Game (jj_mister22)
description:
En: Its just an Horrible Game, i don't recommend to download it but if you want... you've been warned :)

Es: Es solo un juego Horrible, no te recomiendo descargarlo pero si quieres... has sido avisado :)

En: Controls

- W, A, S, D, (or Arrow Keys) to move

- Mouse to camera (only right and left)

- Space to jump (Press repeatedly to Flyyyy)

- Alt + F4 to Exit (in game)

Es: Controles

- W, A, S, D, (o flechas direccionales) para moverte

- Mover el raton para controlar la camara (solo izquierda y derecha)

- Espacio para saltar (pulsa repetidamente para Volaaaaar)

- Alt + F4 Para Salir (dentro de el juego)
